name: Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss
about: What it is:A creamy, high-shine lip gloss with buildable color and a multidimensional, mirror-like finish for the illusion of a fuller, plumper pout..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss.Benefits:Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Spherical Powders: Allow formula to glide on evenly for a superior, wet, glass-like shine..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This rich, ultra-smooth gloss wraps lips in one-swipe color and mirrored shine that wonu2019t move or bleed while the cushiony texture melts into lips for comfortable, non-sticky wear. Itu2019s formulated to be long-lasting and layer seamlessly over lipstick or lip liner for added shine and dimension for any look.
ingredients: -Spherical Powders: Allow formula to glide on evenly for a superior, wet, glass-like shine...Polybutene, Dicalcium Phosphate, Mica, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Silica Silylate, Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Propylene Carbonate, Fragrance (Parfum). May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Orange 5 Lake (Ci 45370), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 6 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 7 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 21 Lake (Ci 45380), Red 22 Lake (Ci 45380), Red 28 (Ci 45410), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 30 (Ci 73360), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360), Red 33 Lake (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985), Yellow 10 Lake (Ci 47005)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe over bare lips for a pop of color and shine..-Layer over your favorite lipstick or lip liner for added shine and dimension..-To get Gwen's glossy-nude lips, overline lips with Pout to Get Real Overlining Lip Liner in Do Whatever (sold separately). Top with Bubble Pop Electric Lip Gloss in Sweet Tooth for the look of naturally fuller lips...Recycling Instructions:.-All GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI outer cartons are 100 percent recyclable. .-Primary containers are made with sustainable materials, including 30 percent or higher PCR (post-consumer recycled) plastic or glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a 5 out of 5 highly recommended product! All 5 senses were very pleased! Smell, texture, packaging, removal, and longevity were absolutely amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm disappointed as this gloss is very heavily scented. It also goes on thick and remains very sticky. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thoroughly impressed with the GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss! First off, the color payoff is incredible. Unlike most lip glosses that tend to be sheer, this one delivers a highly pigmented, bold finish that really stands out. Whether you're going for a subtle pop of color or layering it for a more dramatic look, this gloss does not disappoint.  The texture is another major winu2014itu2019s smooth and creamy without any of that sticky, tacky feeling that some glosses have. It glides on effortlessly, leaving your lips looking full and shiny without feeling heavy or uncomfortable. The staying power is also impressive; it lasts for hours without needing constant reapplication, which is a huge plus.  The scent is a lovely bonusu2014it has a pleasant fragrance that isnu2019t overpowering, just a nice touch that makes the application even more enjoyable. Overall, this lip gloss is a perfect blend of color, comfort, and staying power. If youu2019re looking for a high-quality lip gloss that offers more than just shine, this one is definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love finishing a beautiful makeup look with a great lipgloss or lipstick. I tend to prefer non-sticky gloss that is long wearing and a nice shine to it , I found that this GXVE bubble pop electric lipgloss in the shade u2018all my love- warm berryu2019 is absolutely perfect! I love the shade on my warm olive tone skin, it is cruelty-free, vegan and made the clean list at Sephora so I feel safer putting it on my lips. The formula is creamy and gives a good amount of pigment and color. I like how it adds dimension to the lips giving an illusion of a fuller pout. I tested it out for a day to see if it would be removed throughout the day and truly, it stayed put all I had to do was reapply after eating of course. Not to mention, Gwenu2019s makeup has such cute packaging and sets itself apart giving it an edgy yet clean look. Canu2019t wait to try other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a super pigmented, not sticky but glassy lip gloss formula Bubble Pop Electric High Performance Clean Lip Gloss then the GXVE lip gloss is for you. I was able to try the shade All My Love, which is a beautiful mauvey berry And I can honestly say this is one of my favorite lip gloss formulas.  It is definitely a more opaque formula so keep that in mind. It is very glossy very pigmented perfect to wear on its own, with a lip liner, or an over a lip stain would also be beautiful. I love that it does not feel sticky on your lips and kind of just dries down but keeps that shine for long wearing juiciness.  The applicator is very nice as well. It perfectly contours your lips so with one swipe youu2019re done!  The packaging is also gorgeous. If you are familiar with GXVE packaging, they have that very distinct aesthetic, which I absolutely love.  It is also important to me to find products that are clean, cruelty free, and vegan, so this was a nice plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The design is great! I like this craft package with white letters. The bottle looks gorgeous with black letter as well. When I opened it. I felt the candy sweet smell, as many lip glosses have. But I like this smell. The color is the best match for me, I use it as a single product and as an addition to some of my matte lipsticks. When I apply it by itu2019s own, the lip gross makes my lips look glossy, but not too much. I also feel some hydration. It covers my lips without making even tiny wrinkles visible. Thatu2019s why I also add it to other matte lipsticks, which have this problem. Only one thing made me a little sad. If to apply as a single product, it doesnu2019t last long, I need to renew it every hour or about that. Yes, I still feel it on my lips, but it becomes more invisible and I want it to be with me a little longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good lippie. Give me one with beautiful color, lasting wear and a delicious scent and I am all in. The Bubble Pop Electric in ALL MY LOVE by GXVE is top knotch. First, the packaging. Itu2019s in a mess free tube so you can throw it in your purse without fear of getting sticky in your favorite bag. Love that! Itu2019s rare for a lip gloss scent to grab my attention, but this scent is SO GOOD. I find myself grabbing it just for a boost of dopamine that the scent enhances. Itu2019s love that itu2019s thick enough to last and youu2019ll rarely have to retouch, but itu2019s not so thick that it moves your lipstick or gets on your makeup around your mouth. I love the color they all my love gives, itu2019s a deeper watermelon color, but itu2019s not nearly as dark as it looks in the packaging. I donu2019t think you could go wrong with any shade. This is an incredible lip product and Iu2019m so glad I was gifted it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started to prefer lip gloss over matte lipsticks two years ago. I love how lip gloss gives my lips natural shine and plump. Most importantly, it is easier to apply. So I was super excited to try this GXVE bubble pop electric lip gloss. The all my love color is a little bit darker than I would usually go for. But the color is still pretty. I love the fact that it is not too sticky on my lips after applying. However, I wish the lip application can be a little bit bigger so it might be easier for me to apply. I usually do one or two swaps with the lip gloss but with this one, I have to go over few swaps to reach the coverage and the look I want. I am a mom of two young boys, so I like to do quick makeup before heading out, I would prefer this lip gloss can be a little easier for me to apply. Or probably I should just go for a lighter color.

I am new to the realm of lip cosmetics & makeup. I also struggle with pretty dry lips. My oh my am I so glad to have been introduced to this world, especially by way of this product. The Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss in shade 'All My Love' is my new love, a true hidden gem!   This high-shine lip gloss is formulated with clean, vegan ingredients - free of parabens, sulfates, and alcohol. It also contains several nourishing ingredients that help to keep lips hydrated. Its both gentle on the lips and delivers real hydration.   u2018All My Loveu2019 boasts a gorgeous red/berry/burgundy shade with a glass-like shine. Its the perfect marriage of color and gloss, great everyday wear. The texture is smooth, luxurious, and not too sticky or tacky - super easy application. It gives the best wet, dewy finish I have yet to find in a lip gloss or liquid lipstick. The only thing I might add is that the gloss does transfesr (as gloss commonly does) so be careful around clothing. Other than that, I have nothing but wonderful things to say. I highly recommend this gloss for everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a very beautiful and nice hydrating gloss, This is my first time ever trying something from GXVE beauty. The bubble pop electric lipgloss is in color all my love, itu2019s a beautiful sheer mauve color. Iu2019m truly impressed, with the pigmentation of this gloss and love that itu2019s sheer but pigmented as well, it glides on creamy and smooth, and my lips feel hydrated all day, not sticky or tacky. It's long lasting and very moisturizing. The scent is truly amazing, it smells like a whole bakery of cakes and cupcakes! The packaging/container is really nice and great quality. I think the price is quite ideal for this product. I love the soft/plush applicator. I highly recommend this lipgloss and would love to try every color from this line of lipglosses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely am in love with this lip gloss by GXVE! I have the shade u201cAll my loveu201d and itu2019s the perfect color. I really like the applicator and how it applies! This lip gloss gives such a stunning color and shiny lips! I will definitely be buying this lip gloss over and over because itu2019s that good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this lip gloss. I have always been a gloss person rather than lipstick. Lipstick is hard for me to apply for some reason but I love the color. I don't really have any lips so I take all the help I can get. This had just a touch of color to it which makes it look natural on my mouth. With a really good glossy shine to make my lips feel juicy. I can't say that I am crazy about the smell. That's probably the only reason I didn't give this gloss five stars, but it isn't horrible. I have products that smell much worse. It just smells like coffee to me or like a frappuccino. I'm not a big coffee person, so it would probably smell better if you were a coffee lover.  It doesn't have a taste at all which I thought was nice and once you apply this, it lasts for quite a while. I absolutely adore the packaging. It just makes me feel bougie holding it. It is so pretty. The wand is good and overall I do like this a lot. I would love to see it come in different flavors though.

reviews.review_title: The Perfect Lip Glossu2014A Pop of Electric Shine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the privilege to try  GXVE Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss by Gwen Stefani The Lip Gloss is everything I've been searching for! The formula is smooth and non-sticky, providing a beautiful, high-shine finish that lasts for hours. I love that itu2019s clean and cruelty-free, so I can feel good about what Iu2019m putting on my lips. The color payoff is stunningu2014just the right amount of pigment to give my lips a vibrant pop without being overpowering. I particularly love how long-lasting the color is  without any need for touch-ups throughout the day. GXVE Pop Electric High-Performace Clean Lip Gloss has  become my go-to gloss for both everyday wear and special occasions. Gwen Stefani has truly nailed it with this one! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: have super dry, parched lips twenty four seven regardless of the time of year, season or temperature. Iu2019m a beauty professional and absolutely love a good lip gloss. A shiney lip just finishes the whole look and looks fresh and can be casual and intriguing whether the occasion is every day or black tie. Gxve Bubble Pop is unique with spherical powder throughout to help it melt into the lips and give a long lasting pop of fresh.  I tried the gloss alone on exfoliated and prepped lips, using the applicator included in the tube. I was really surprised when I first touched it to my lips because the applicator is cushion like, soft and has some bounce, giving it a unique feel. I was worried that the color would be too warm but found it adjusted to my skin tone and looks flattering.  The texture is soft and slippery without being greasy and glides on like a charm.  What I love the most is that. I was worried that it might feather or bleed but there was no sign of that. Not a bit of stickiness and my lips felt wonderful after wearing it all day.  Whether you wear alone or on top of lipstick Bubble Pop is worth a try and the price wonu2019t break the bank.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I knew I would love this lip gloss. The tint it leaves is so pretty and IO didnu2019t even have to apply a lot. Itu2019s also a lot more nourishing than I thought it would be. Itu2019s definitely something I can apply without having to layer with another moisturizer. The color and nourishing feel lasted for about 3 hrs for me and thatu2019s with eating and drinking. Now keep in mind, this lip gloss was able to last so long because it is sticky. I actually prefer sticky glosses because I like how long-lasting they are, but if thatu2019s not something you like, then this product isnu2019t for you. Time to get into the smell. The smell is amazing. I love the vanilla scent it has. I love it. I could sit and sniff it all day. If you like sweet scents, then youu2019re gonna love this. I actually threw out my old gloss and replaced it with this one. If you like long-lasting lip-gloss and gourmand scents, then this is the product for you.

reviews.review_title: Love the song AND the gloss!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a gloss girl, or a tinted lip balm girl. I like the sheer and the shiny and products that apply east and donu2019t require a perfect application.   I rarely wear anything matte especially liquid lipsticks. With that and as beauty professional Iu2019ve tried many glosses over the years!  This one by Gxve is quite good.  I tried the All of Me color which is described as a u201cwarm berryu201d. The packaging is very cute.  The texture is thinner, not too sticky but has enough body to gxve a lot of color and moisture!  The formula is vegan and gluten free and contains spherical powders that make for the even coverage of the color shine.  The applicator is a doe foot which also adds to the even application.  The scent to lightly vanilla (NOT bubble gum despite the name).   I definitely would like to try my colors from this fab formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS! I live a dehydrated lifestyle so chapped lips are a common site for me. It makes lipstick a total no-go but this gloss is ultra hydrating. I throw some chapstick on as a base layer and then swipe on the lipgloss and it locks in the moisture all day. Love the color, shine factor and how long it stays put

I love this lip gloss.  Itu2019s super shinny but also hydrating.  Itu2019s also not sticky on your lips but still give you the high shine of a lip gloss.  I love that it has just a tiny of color soo you can reapply all day.  Great to keep in your bag you can also throw over a lipstick for extra shine!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Color, Mostly Smooth, Only Slight Sticky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I was a little girl, I have always loved lip gloss, and as an adult, I still love lip gloss. For the most part, I like this lip gloss. It has a really pretty color and I think it looks really good on me. The shade may appear dark, but once I applied it, it wasn't as dark on my lips but it is buildable and could go well with lipstick as well. It is also a shade I feel would go well with various skin tones. I also like the amount of shine it has to it as well as the scent of the lip gloss. To me, the scent is sweet like vanilla frosting, and it reminds me a lot of my childhood and teenage years and the glosses I used to back then. Now I didn't find it all that sticky but there is a slight stickiness to it, but for the most part, I felt my lips were pretty smooth when I rubbed them together with just a slight tackiness to them but not enough to bother me. As for how long it lasts, it does last a while but not all day and would need applying especially if you're eating or drinking but overall, I was fairly satisfied with how long it lasted.  *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For my first time trying anything from GXVR, i was blown away!! I love Gwen Stefani and cant believe i havent tried anything from her makeup line yet. I can be pretty picky with my lipglosses and dont like ones that are overly sticky, this one is just on the border of stickiness but its more tolerable and doesnt stick to every piece of hair that flies in my face. Everything else about it is amazing though! It has great color payoff which I was expecting due to Gwens signature lip, and the scent is really nice! To me it smells like a warm vanilla cookie. I do have to reapply a fee times throughout the day, but this is typically for a lipgloss and i would say it keeps my lips fairly hydrated. I will definitely be wanting to buy more colors in the future.

reviews.review_title: Not bad but thick on the lips.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who really loves lip gloss and has tried a ton of glosses on the market, I really wanted to love this product. The packaging is super cute and I loved the shade u201call my love.u201d The smell is delicious, like a cake batter vanilla, which I love as well. Unfortunately the formula was just a little too thick for my liking. Itu2019s not bad by any means, itu2019s just okay. It goes on really thick and is sticky on the lips, which is why I give it 3 stars. The color payoff is pretty good and I think this shade would be great with a darker lip liner to really accentuate the lips, or with a plumper underneath. Other than that, it did make my lips feel soft and hydrated and once I had let it sit for a little bit it was a little more comfortable on the lips, but the formula was still really thick which was the biggest downside.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an esthetician with over 15 years under my belt. I love lip products because it is the simplest way to look u201cput togetheru201d without loading up on the face make up. I tend to wear more glosses because they are easy to apply. Even though they donu2019t last long I would rather reapply between clients than be half smudged. This lip gloss acts like lipstick in the way that it doesnu2019t run. Most glosses seem to run around the lip line where these stays put. I am not too thrilled with the smell. It smells like vanilla and reminds me of being a pre-teen in the mid 90u2019s. I felt the formula to be gummy as well. I know that is normal for a gloss and I know that is probably why it stays put but it feels heavy on my lips. The good thing is that it removes easily. All in all, I think anyone could use and enjoy this. I would be interested in trying her other lip products because I find GXVEu2019s colors to be fun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  I am a fifty-one years young beauty enthusiast. I was excited to receive GXVE by Gwen Stefani Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Lip Gloss in shade All My Love (Warm Berry). As an ethically-conscious beauty enthusiast, I love that this brand is cruelty free and does not test its products on animals. I love that this lip gloss is formulated with clean ingredients.   The shade All My Love looks does compliment my fair complexion  but looks more nude-toned than berry on my bare lips. However, it pairs well layered with berry, wine, and plum lip liners.  The lip gloss is easy to apply and build color. I really like that this lip gloss does not feather or bleed. Like most lip glosses I have used, the texture is a little sticky. I do like that theis lip gloss does not stain my lips and is easy to remove. The fragrance is a bit strong but not unpleasant.   As a beauty enthusiast,  I would recommend this lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  I am a fifty-one years young beauty enthusiast. I was excited to receive GXVE by Gwen Stefani Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Lip Gloss in shade All My Love (Warm Berry). As an ethically-conscious beauty enthusiast, I love that this brand is cruelty free and does not test its products on animals. I love that this lip gloss is formulated with clean ingredients. The lip gloss is easy to apply and build color. I really like that this lip gloss does not feather or bleed. Like most lip glosses I have used, the texture is a little sticky. I do like that theis lip gloss does not stain my lips and is easy to remove. The fragrance is a bit strong but not unpleasant.   As a beauty enthusiast,  I would recommend this lip gloss.

reviews.review_title: Pigmented and Sticky In a Good Way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a recovering lip product junkie, GXVEu2019s High-Shine Lip Gloss formula makes me want to go back to my old ways and buy all the shades. Itu2019s my favorite kind of lip-gloss formula. One that has less slip and more grip, one that is kinda sticky and isnu2019t lightweight, one that is hydrating and nourishing, and one that provides high shine. The wand is completely flat and easy to work with, but doesnu2019t pick up much product (fine for my thinner lips).  I have it in the shade u201cAll My Loveu201d and itu2019s described as a warm berry that will suit many skin tones. It is pigmented with only one pass, but can be built up even more.  My favorite quality about this creamy formula is how I can still use it when I have dry cracked lips because of how hydrating it feels and how it doesnu2019t emphasize the dryness or sink into lip lines. Its easy to apply and while it is pigmented, lipliner isnu2019t a necessity. And I also like how it leaves behind an even stain and lip balm feel behind when the glossiness has worn off. Only thing I do not like about this lip gloss is the scent. It smells like that generic vanilla scent in the tube, but it isnu2019t noticeable when on the lips. Highly recommend the shade u201cAll My Loveu201d and this formula if you like pigmented thicker glosses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m loving the Gxve Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Gloss, I used the shade All my love! It gives my lips an amazing shine that makes them look fuller and plump. You do not need a lot of this product. I think it lasts a good amount of time on the lips for a gloss! The formula is non-sticky and feels comfortable, going on smoothly for a long-lasting finish without feeling super tacky. The color is just right for day or night. Plus, the packaging is such nice quality, feels very high end. I had no doubts the gloss would stay sealed in my bag and there would be no risk of any messes. It's definitely a go-to in my beauty routine now, adding just the right amount of glam to my look. I enjoy pulling the gloss out of my purse and tending to touch ups because the gloss component is so cute!!  The fact that it is a clean beauty product is a HUGE plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this gloss except for the color. The warm berry is beautiful but I donu2019t love it on me. I can see it on many skin tones. It is not sticky and feels moisturizing. This gloss has great pigment and can easily be a bold color. I liked the vanilla fragrance and I love that it is a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a gloss lover, I was really excited to try this GXVE gloss! The packaging is a nice, standard gloss tube. I do like that itu2019s clear so you can see the color inside. The applicator is also a standard gloss applicator, which is fine. I prefer a larger doe foot style, but no issue with a standard size. The gloss smells great, a typical lipstick scent. The color All My Love is absolutely gorgeous. The gloss itself is decently opaque that provides a gorgeous color on the lips and a great glossy finish. The only thing I took one star off for was how sticky this gloss is. The gloss is decently thick which makes it pretty sticky on the lips. Very typical for a lot of glosses, but that ends up being the factor that makes me not reach for these types of glosses the most. Overall, very pretty color and worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. As a beauty enthusiast and lip care lover I am a huge fan of GXVE Bubble Pop High Hine Lip Gloss. The applicator gave me the perfect amount of gloss with the first stroke. Let me tell you it is very shiny! I received the shade All My love which I thought would be a lot more red but it was a perfect shade of pink and matched my skin tone very well. I did apply three times throughout the night in between eating and drinking. I definitely recommend if you are a huge gloss fan like I am!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started using the Gwen Stefani all my love bubble pop electric lip gloss it is absolutely beautiful, not only is it a very clean brand, but it's also plumping to the lips and gives incredible gloss. shine. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast, I was thrilled to try the GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High Shine Lip Gloss in the shade All My Love. Initially, I was a little nervous about the shade matching my fair skin, but the subtle color looked beautiful! The gloss delivered a super glossy, fuller effect with just the right hint of color. It felt incredibly luxurious and rich on my lips, yet remained lightweight and comfortable. This might just be one of the best lip glosses I've ever tried.  Not only does this lip gloss provide the ultimate hydration, leaving my lips feeling softer than ever, but it also boasts impressive staying power. I was genuinely impressed by how long it lasted without needing to reapply, even after eating and drinking.  Overall I'm so glad I discovered this lip gloss; it's become a staple in my makeup bag! If you're a lipstick-lover like me, I highly recommend trying GXVE's Bubble Pop Electric.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup and No Doubt lover I was so excited to try out products from Gxve Beauty, especially the Bubble Pop Electric lip gloss. I have to say I was so impressed with this lip gloss! It is a thick, but buttery texture that just feels so lovely on my lips. It is super easy to apply and one coat does a great, even job. I have worn this to work and while I'm out all day and I have found it is so long lasting! I really only need to reapply after eating. I tried out the lip gloss in the shade All My Love which I think is perfect to wear year round. It isn't the shade I typically buy, but I found myself loving it and I think it looks amazing with both no makeup or heavy makeup looks which is awesome. It definitely is super glossy and high shine which I am obsessed with. Overall I think this is a great lip product for the price point!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try out the GXVE by Gwen Stefani Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss in the shade All My Love. The first thing I noticed was that the color swatch on the outer cardboard packaging was much lighter and peachier than what it looks like in the tube. The component itself is nice. It feels high quality and has more of that classic doe foot style applicator vs the oversized ones we've been seeing a lot with new launches. The scent is pleasant and not so strong that it's noticeable beyond application. The formula feels kind of dated, to be completely honest. It is more of a thicker sticky gloss that reminds me of the types of lip glosses that released a decade ago. That said, if you're used to this kind of texture, it's a nice product. This shade is not nearly as deep berry as it appears in the tube; it sheers out evenly and wears a pretty long time. Overall, I like it but it's not going to be a holy grail product in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this gloss is absolutely stunning! First off the packaging is absolutely gorgeous! It feels very heavy and super luxurious! The wand itself that is used to apply the product has a beautiful doe foot that applies the product absolutely flawlessly! This shade All My Love is absolutely the most gorgeous nude providing a beautiful textured gloss that gives your lips a nice amount of coverage while depositing the most beautiful pigment to the lips! This gloss has a beautiful texture that leaves the lips beautifully glossy and provides hydration! For a gloss the formulation of this product is beautiful and not to thick leaving you with a beautiful slip between the lips! This gloss is absolutely stunning and I highly recommend to all those people out there that enjoy a beautiful high quality gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color, All My Love goes great with my skin tone and coloring. It is a berry color, great for the fall season. The lip gloss has a vanilla scent when you open the container, which I enjoyed. I did have to reapply after a few hours. Overall I liked the lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have a sweet tooth, this might as well want to make you eat it! It's the first time that I tried Gwen Stefani' GXVE beauty products. GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Lip Gloss has a delicious scent to it. It has a sweet, candy like scent. I applied the All My Love shade to my bare lips. It has a high glossy factor. It is tinted. I love that it's highly pigmented. It does not smudge or transfer. I like that I can wear it by itself and don't need any other lip products. It also lightly moisturizes my lips. The packaging is very professional looking. This is one of the very few lip glosses that I've tried that has a long lasting scent and color pay off. It lasts me all day long. It does feel sticky but I don't mind it. I can't wait to try out the different shades that are available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will not wear lipstick. I have never liked it. I will however, spend my money on every brand lipgloss there is to buy. This brand did NOT disappoint. Itu2019s really great quality. The color is just right and glides right on. I like it a lot. u201cThis review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a stay at home mom that loves to look good every day.  I am always looking for new products to add to my makeup routine now that I am in my mid 30s.    I wear lipgloss every single day and have for MANY years.  The All My Love shade was absolutely perfect for me and matched my skintone so well.  Even others were complimenting me on the shade.  I loved that the gloss never seemed to get on my teeth.    I personally don't love that it feels super sticky, and I wish it lasted a little longer than it did.  I would still recommend.  This product is being added to my makeup routine because the shade is literal perfection, and I will probably keep it in my purse for quick applications when out and about to give me a little boost of confidence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade All My Love of the Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip gloss is a product any beauty enthusiast is going to love! The color of this gloss is gorgeous and sophisticated allowing you to build upon the warmness and deepness of it during application. It is a versatile product that would pair greatly with other products to achieve a variety of looks. I loved the vanilla smell of this gloss, it left me with an almost nostalgic feeling from using scented lip glosses as a young girl. The one thing I would change about this product is the fact that it is on the stickier side and not super hydrating. I found that pairing this product with hydrating products resulted in the best look. Aside from that, I really enjoyed this gloss from GXVE Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The GXVE Beauty by Gwen Stefani Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss is fun! It has a warm vanilla cupcake scent offering a creamy texture with a high shine appearance. It's slightly sticky and it lasts similarly to other glosses. It has buildable color with a very high pigment value. It feels very comfortable and hydrating on the lips, not heavy with no bleed into the lip lines. If you used a complimentary liner it would add additional lasting power and make the lips appear fuller with its mirror-like shine. Appreciate its a vegan product especially since we ultimately ingest lip products. Five shades of pretty colors, All My Love, a saturated berry shade, I will love wearing it into the autumnal months. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade All My Love is a really beautiful warm berry color that looked really nice on my lighter complexion, and I think it would look good on a lot of different skin tones. The pigment is really nice, and you could build it up to make it even more pigmented. Unfortunately, the color is pretty much the only thing I really enjoyed about this lip gloss. This lip gloss is very, very sticky, which I didn't like, and it doesn't feel like it moisturized my lips at all. It is also very heavily scented, like super sweet artificial vanilla, and not in a good way. When I first smelled it without putting it on my lips, I thought it was fine, but after wearing it for a few hours, I wanted to take it off. I personally wouldn't recommend this lip gloss due to the fact that the only thing I enjoyed about it was the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss in u201cAll My Loveu201d is an absolute game-changer for any beauty enthusiast! The shade u201cAll My Loveu201d is a dreamy, flattering hue that complements a wide range of skin tones with its perfect balance of shimmer and color. Whether youu2019re going for a bold or natural look, this gloss adds a touch of glam thatu2019s hard to resist. The gloss is buildable to achieve the desired look and created with clean ingredients. A must-have for your makeup collection!

reviews.review_title: Thereu2019s a reason this gloss sells out!

I would highly recommend trying if you are on the market for a new li

reviews.review_text: I like some of the products from this line but unfortunately this lip gloss was just not for me. To start, The formula was semi sticky and gloopy and made my lips stick together, which is a big turn off for me when it comes to lip gloss and other lip products. also,  it didnu2019t look very flattering on my lips either. It was patchy and wore off in some places quicker than others. I also found the formula to be kind of drying once I removed it. My lips felt oddly flaky, which is not something I feel after using a lipgloss. Itu2019s a pretty shade but I do not prefer sticky textures on my lips and so this was a pass for me. I would not recomend this product to anyone unless you enjoy a tacky feel on the lips. I do love the packaging and the applicator is very nice but overall this is not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this ultra shiny All My Love (Warm Berry) shade of Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss. Itu2019s from Gwen Stefaniu2019s brand GXVE (pronounced u201cGiveu201d).  Bonus points from me as itu2019s vegan, gluten free, and cruelty free. Itu2019s also a Sephora u201cCleanu201d brand so you can feel good knowing the ingredients are high quality and not damaging. From the cute packaging to the u201cpopu201d you hear when you take out the applicator, this is a fun gloss to use.  I love high shine looks and for me, this was prismatic.  Because I am a huge fan of the u201cwetu201d look, I usually reapply after every couple hours and definitely after eating or drinking. You can wear it over lipstick but I donu2019t. I feel the tint and shine of this shade was perfect for me as a stand alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would highly impressed with this lip gloss. Itu2019s very pigmented. Itu2019s long lasting. It is smooth and creamy when applied. Itu2019s on the thicker side  and a little sticky.  It also has a cushioning texture to it as well. I have no issue with the transferring. because itu2019s so pigmented, I could wear it on its own with no other lip products. I also really like the smell it has almost like a sweet sent to it. If youu2019re looking for a long lasting lip gloss, thatu2019s on a thicker side recommend this product. Plus this product, and most of the products from this brand are extremely I can purchase this in the future and try other shades. Because $14 is a steel for this product. Itu2019s also made with clean ingredients and is cruelty free, and which I do appreciate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This a great universal shade that would be flattering on a multitude of skin tones. Itu2019s not too warm or too cool and has a true berry color. As a brown girl, I didnu2019t need to wear a brown lip liner to make it work so that was refreshing. I strictly wear lip glosses these days, but I think this would look nice on top of a lipstick because itu2019s only slightly opaque. The one thing I didnu2019t like about the formula is how sticky it is. With the popularity of lip oils and tinted lip balms, I think this product should be reformulated to remove the stickiness and maybe add some skincare ingredients to make it more hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a lover of makeup and all things girly and so excited for GXVE by GWEN STEFANI Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss in All My Love as it is such a fun color that can be used year round. This is the perfect tint of berry lip gloss that gives lips the perfect shine. I love that it is more translucent and can be built up or applied on top of lipstick to give a berry tint and high shine. Itu2019s easily applied with a built in applicator and goes on smooth, leaving lips looking fuller and plumper. I didnu2019t find that it was super sticky or flakey. I actually liked the fact that I can use the lip gloss solo, with lip liner or over lipstick and it did not dry out my lips or leave them flakey. Itu2019s a great addition to any lip gloss selection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was one of those girly girl who would collect all shades of glosses once they were out during my college days. This GXVE by Gwen Stefani Bubble pop electric high performance clean lip gloss has reminded me of those amazing days. I have used this lip gloss a few times already, it has that lightweight formula & smooth texture, doesnu2019t get stick at the ends which is promising. It is buildable & can be used on any lipstick. That will give a glossy effect to your favorite lipstick. Gxve in shade All My Love-warm berry lip gloss itself has really pretty color which makes it so versatile can be worn alone or on top of lipsticks. Best thing is its cruelty free & free from all nasty ingredients. Can be worn on daily basis hence i consider it keeping in my bag all the time for that glossy look whenever needed. This is such a great option if you like to invest in good products. Definitely recommend it to all the girlies out there.  *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying anything from the brand GXVE and I was very excited to have the opportunity to try a couple of their products because Iu2019ve heard great things. The Bubble Pop Electric High Shine Lip Gloss in the shade All My Love is a mauvy color and has become a highly used product in my makeup routine. It is a smooth and creamy lip gloss that is on the thicker side and somewhat sticky. I really enjoy the cushiony texture of this product as well as the high shine buildable color. I havenu2019t had any issues with it bleeding and itu2019s long lasting. It looks nice both when itu2019s worn by itself or when itu2019s worn with other lip products. It doesnu2019t look streaky and it wears off evenly. I also really enjoy that it smells sweet like cupcakes or vanilla frosting. The component is thick and sturdy and feels high quality. My lips are on the smaller side so I like that the applicator doesnu2019t come out of the tube with a ton of product on it which makes it less messy and easier to apply. If you like a pigmented lip gloss thatu2019s a bit thicker and long lasting, youu2019ll really enjoy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color is  beautiful. I love how hydrated my lips feel and the makes my lips look a little u201cextrau201d but still natural this needs to be reapplied often . reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment I opened the packaging I was hooked on the delightful scentu2014it's vanilla but not overpowering, which makes application a treat. The gloss itself is stunning, delivering a high-shine finish that looks just as gorgeous on its own as it does layered over lipstick. One of the standout features for me is the application brush. It's perfectly designed for smooth, even application, ensuring that the gloss glides on effortlessly without any streaks. Whether I'm going for a natural, glossy look or adding a pop of shine to my favorite lipstick, this gloss delivers every time. Overall, GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss deserves all five stars for its scent, versatility, and flawless application. Itu2019s a must-have for anyone who loves a glossy finish with a touch of luxury. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love lip gloss, so I was super excited to try one from GXVE, your new go-to for luscious, hydrated lips with a pop of color! These glosses are not only super pigmented and long-lasting, but they also have a hydrating formula that keeps your lips feeling soft and smooth. Plus, they come in a range of stunning shades that are perfect for any occasion. I received the shade All my Love, which is a beautiful cross between a berry color and a brick red. Whether you're going for a natural look or a bold statement, there's a shade for you in this collection, and the color is buildable. It's not sticky like most lip glosses, and it did last through most of my meal. Its definitely a keeper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a makeup lover and feel like I've tried pretty much every lip gloss on the market. I have been using this lipgloss for the last week or so and I love it! This gloss is super versatile and can be used on its on for a quick no-makeup look, or with other lip products for a more glam look! I love products like this that have both moisturizing benefits and look great on! If you love lip products and are on the search for a lip gloss that adds color, shine, and moisture for several hours then I think you would really love this product!

reviews.review_title: Gloss smells amazing and a pretty color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss in the shade ALL MY LOVE is a beautiful berry color that I think would look great on many skin tones. I love the smell of it. The color u201cAll My Loveu201d is a beautiful, natural shade that matches my skin tone perfectly. Itu2019s not overly dynamic or loud, making it perfect for any occasionu2014be it a casual day running errands or a more intimate date night. It doesnu2019t require constant touch-ups; it lasts a good amount of time. Plus, the mirror shine finish is just stunning. reviews.review_text: The quest for the perfect lip gloss seems to be an ongoing saga in the beauty world. Even for someone like myself, whose been in the beauty world for 10 years. Being able to try the GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss has me obsessed! It's sleek, chic, and feels luxurious to the touch, setting the stage for a premium product experience. Upon applying the lip gloss, the first thing I noticed was the texture. True to its description, the formula is indeed creamy and cushiony, melting into my lips with an incredibly comfortable feel. There's none of that sticky, tacky sensation that often comes with high-shine glosses. Instead, it feels hydrating and lightweight, almost as if I'm not wearing anything on my lips at all. I was impressed with the buildable color of the Bubble Pop Electric gloss. A single swipe provides a sheer wash of color thatu2019s perfect for a more natural look, while additional layers amp up the intensity for a more dramatic effect. As for its staying power, the gloss delivers on its long-wearing promise. It stays put without moving or bleeding, maintaining its shiny finish for hours. I was particularly pleased to find that it layers seamlessly over lipstick or lip liner, allowing for versatility in creating different looks. Whether worn alone or as a finishing touch over other lip products, it adds shine and dimension without compromising the wear time. The GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss has exceeded my expectations in nearly every way. From its luxurious application and comfortable wear to its impressive shine and color payoff, it's a product that delivers on its promises. For those in search of a lip gloss that offers the perfect blend of shine, color, and comfort, I wholeheartedly recommend giving the GXVE Bubble Pop Electric a try.

I normally do a nude ombre lip but the gloss in the shade u201csweet toothu201d really took the term ombre and created its own definition for it. I really appreciated the thickness of this gloss because it prevented me from having to use 3 or 4 lip products just to get the look I desired. Personally, the lip gloss acts as a lipstick as well because of the rich color and due to how it just stays in place without needing to put in too much work. The shade u201cAll My Loveu201d is beautiful too. I can definitely see me wearing this by itself or maybe even on top of a dark red lipstick.

reviews.review_text: I love lip products and I was very excited to try this clean beauty lip gloss but my experience with this has been a mix of highs and lows, and here's why:  Let's start with the positivesu2014I absolutely adore the shine and creamy texture of this lip gloss. It glides on effortlessly, providing a luscious sheen that adds a touch of glamour to any look. The ease of application is another plus, making it a convenient option for on-the-go touch-ups.  However, one major downside for me is the sticky consistency. Despite its beautiful shine and texture, I found the gloss to be uncomfortably sticky, which detracted from the overall experience. It's a shame because otherwise, it would have been a top contender in my makeup bag.  In terms of shades, All My Love stole my heart with its perfect hue that complemented my skin tone beautifully. On the other hand, Sweet Tooth missed the marku2014it was too light for my complexion and didn't flatter me at all.  On a brighter note, the lip gloss has an amazing scent that adds to the overall enjoyment of wearing it. Plus, knowing that it's vegan and cruelty-free brings me peace of mind and aligns with my values.  I also appreciate that the gloss doesn't bleed. However, I found the lasting power to be just okayu2014it didn't quite live up to my expectations, especially considering its other impressive qualities.  In conclusion, while this lip gloss has its strengths, including its shine, creamy texture, and appealing scent, the stickiness and underwhelming lasting power were major drawbacks for me. With some improvements in these areas, it could easily become a favorite in my beauty routine.   I would recommend it for those who can overlook the stickiness and prioritize the other positive aspects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lip product junkie, I never leave the house without something on my lips and at least 5 different lip products in my purse. Gwen did not disappoint me with these Bubble Pop High Shine Glosses! They really are extremely shiny and pack a punch of pigmented color.   The formula is a little thicker and a tad stickier than Iu2019m used to but I find that lip products that have these qualities are longer lasting, which in my opinion is a good trade-off because then I donu2019t have to keep reapplying it throughout the day.   The smell of these is heavenly, itu2019s like a rich deep caramel vanilla. My favorite shade is All My Love. Itu2019s such a beautiful berry color that I can see looking stunning on every skin color Itu2019s definitely a head turner and it has garnered me quite a few compliments!   If you love a long lasting lip gloss that smells amazing and is super shiny, youu2019ll love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast and someone who loves doing make up, I was very excited to try products from the Gwen Stefani line. More importantly, I wanted to see what it would look like on black skin as not all brands are dark skin friendly. I was very thrilled by the packaging as it was made with recyclable material. The design of the lip gloss was also attractive. I got two colors; u201csweet toothu201d which is a peach color and u201call my loveu201d which is warm berry. Sweet tooth was a bit harsh on my skin tone when I used it alone. When I combined it with my go-to lip liner (Chestnut by MAC), it was acceptable. All my love was perfect. I did not need to subdue it with a lip liner. It had a nice berry colored tint to it.   Both smelled AMAZING. Almost like an edible piece of candy. The lip glosses had great shine, were buildable, thick, and mildly sticky. They lasted about 5 hours (in the absence of me eating) before I had to retouch it. I recommend this. Will be getting all my love again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast, I am a huge fan of the GXVE lip gloss, I have received the shade sweet tooth - natural peach, it is incredibly rich that glides on my lips so well and gives shine that looks like glass to my lips. it is very comfortable to wear with no stickiness and layers well with other lip products but the shade sweet tooth is not quite right for me. It is a beautiful natural peach color and nude look, but I like bolder shades or colors with a bit more warmth to them. They have a great selection of colors, from sheer pinks to bold reds, so I am confident bold colors match my skin tone more. I love try layering this shade with a darker lip liner to add some extra noticeable look. I love how comfortable, long-wearing, high-shine lip gloss that is also vegan and cruelty free. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves a glossy lip, I was thrilled to try the GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss. After using it for several days, I can confidently say that this gloss has earned a permanent place in my makeup bag. The creamy formula glides on effortlessly, providing buildable color and a stunning, multidimensional shine. It makes my lips look fuller and more voluminous. I love how I can wear this gloss alone for a subtle, glossy look or layer it over my favorite lipstick for added dimension and shine. One of the standout features of this lip gloss is its comfortable, non-sticky texture. Unlike some glosses that feel heavy or tacky on the lips, this one melts into my lips, providing a cushiony, weightless feel. The long-wearing formula stays put without bleeding or migrating, ensuring that my lips look great for hours on end. As someone who values clean beauty, I appreciate that this lip gloss is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free. It's great to know that I can achieve a high-shine, plumped-up look without compromising my values. If you're looking for a lip gloss that delivers intense shine, comfortable wear, and buildable color, the GXVE BY GWEN STEFANI Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Clean Lip Gloss is definitely worth trying. Whether you wear it alone or paired with your favorite lip products, this gloss is sure to become a staple in your makeup routine.    *This review was collected as a part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

This GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss is vegan and cruelty free so you can feel good about using this product. I do wish this lip gloss lasted a little longer throughout the day because I feel like I do have to reapply often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast who is also a huge Gwen Stefani fan, believe me when I say I was extra excited to try the Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss.  The packaging is stunning, high quality and super fun and trendy, totally on brand for her. While I didn't love the formula or the scent, I did feel like these glosses were pretty hydrating on the lips and I loved the shades I tried. They look much darker in the tube than on the lips, but since it's a gloss that's to be expected. The scent was very sweet, but not terrible, just not my favorite. The formula itself was just a bit thicker and kinda sticky for me. I found using it over my lips once I lined and filled them in with liner worked best and gave me better results. I just typically prefer a more silky feeling gloss, versus being a bit on the sticky side. The color and the shine is on point though, so it depends a lot on your personal preference. Definitely worth a try if you love a thicker gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GIVE - Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss   This lip gloss has become one of my favorites, incredible shine and gloss, not too sticky but thick enough to give you a beautiful coverage.  The color is buildable and long-lasting.  This is great for anyone who likes high shine and vibrant color that lasts with a delicious yummy scent that I can only describe as cupcake dreams. The packaging is really cute, sleek and ready to go. It is a great addition to anyone's gloss collection and the color variety is amazing. The formula is easy to work with, complementary and streakless wich I appreciate the most. If you are in the hunt for a great gloss, the search is over with this one! Highly recommended and worth the hype! Also, it is vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.review_text: The GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss takes inspiration from Gwen Stefani's amazing style. Yet, with the trend of concealer lips potentially making a comeback, this old-fashioned shade might find its moment once again. Overall, GXVE gives you lip gloss that's stylish and trendy, with options for everyone.

reviews.review_text: The GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss takes inspiration from Gwen Stefani's amazing style. It's got a smooth rich and long-lasting formula, but it's pretty sticky, which might bother some people. I would prefer reapply lip gloss multiple times than feel this stickiness.  The beautiful shade All in Love looks great even without a lip lineru2014it's juicy and natural. Do not look on the shade in the tube, it seems dark, but it truly wearable kind of red shade. Color of your lips but better.  Overall, GXVE gives you lip gloss that's stylish and trendy, with options for everyone.

Overall, I really enjoyed this lip gloss. I liked the texture of it, the silky smoothness, and it was actually very lightweight. One thing, particularly was the smell somewhere between vanilla and marshmallows. I tried to shades one called sweet tooth, and the other called all my love. I think from my skin tone, the sweet tooth was very unflattering as someone with east Asian skin because it almost made me look like I didnu2019t have lips or it was blending in with my cheek, so didnu2019t really like that. However, I really enjoyed the shade all my love. I thought it added a perfect touch of color without being too overdramatic, but still have that glossy brownish pinkish orange hue. For both of them I really liked how it felt on my lips and I thought it felt almost a bit moisturizing as well. I would definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 32 year old beauty enthusiast and I live in Arizona. I have very fair, dry skin as well as dry, flaky lips. I like to use lip glosses that give a bit of color, make my dry lips feel more hydrated and that last a long time without feeling sticky.  Bubble Pop Electric is a beautiful lipgloss in gorgeous packaging. itu2019s a super smooth formula with a wet, glassy-like shine. There are spherical powders in the formula that give you a very even application.  This is not one of those sticky lip glosses that your hair gets stuck to. Think of it more of a creamy, smooth, hydrating gloss that feels good on. I love how I can use on its own or I can layer it and apply on top of a lipstick/lipliner. I like the added dimension it gives and I think of it more of my going-out look.  Sweet Tooth is such a beautiful, pinky nude that goes well with everything.  All My Love is a terracotta/light berry color. It looks much darker in the tube. Donu2019t be intimidated!

These glosses have a yummy sweet scent to them, which I personally love in a gloss! Overall, I am impressed with these glosses!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love lip gloss and this one worked perfect for me and smells so good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss comes in clear tubes that are in a variety of vibrant colours. The lipglosses have an enticing aroma about them that reminds me of sugary pastries. Yum! It's great that I'm able to switch up on which colour lipgloss to wear each day to coordinate with my clothing. I also like to pair the lipglosses with a lipliner. Also, I found the glosses a tad bit sticky for my taste. But, overall I'm satisfied. I recommend GXVE to those who are looking to make their lips plump, add shine, creamy texture, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The quest for the perfect lip gloss seems to be an ongoing saga in the beauty world. Even for someone like myself, whose been in the beauty world for 10 years. Being able to try the GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss has me obsessed! It's sleek, chic, and feels luxurious to the touch, setting the stage for a premium product experience. Upon applying the lip gloss, the first thing I noticed was the texture. True to its description, the formula is indeed creamy and cushiony, melting into my lips with an incredibly comfortable feel. There's none of that sticky, tacky sensation that often comes with high-shine glosses. Instead, it feels hydrating and lightweight, almost as if I'm not wearing anything on my lips at all. I was impressed with the buildable color of the Bubble Pop Electric gloss. A single swipe provides a sheer wash of color thatu2019s perfect for a more natural look, while additional layers amp up the intensity for a more dramatic effect. As for its staying power, the gloss delivers on its long-wearing promise. It stays put without moving or bleeding, maintaining its shiny finish for hours. I was particularly pleased to find that it layers seamlessly over lipstick or lip liner, allowing for versatility in creating different looks. Whether worn alone or as a finishing touch over other lip products, it adds shine and dimension without compromising the wear time. The GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss has exceeded my expectations in nearly every way. From its luxurious application and comfortable wear to its impressive shine and color payoff, it's a product that delivers on its promises. For those in search of a lip gloss that offers the perfect blend of shine, color, and comfort, I wholeheartedly recommend giving the GXVE Bubble Pop Electric a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

I did like that it was a thicker consistency than other glosses and that it wasnu2019t as messy but it was also too thick that I struggled applying and had to keep adding. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently added the Bubble Pop Electric Lip Gloss in the shade All My Love to my collection, and it has quickly become a lip essential for me. Already a fan of the shade Sweet Tooth, I had high expectations, and I'm happy to say that this gloss exceeded them.  All My Love is a beautiful warm berry, and the color is just as stunning as described. The creamy, high-shine formula provides a multidimensional, mirror-like finish that gives the illusion of fuller, plumper lips. It's the perfect touch of warmth for any makeup look.  What sets this lip gloss apart is its buildable color. Whether you want a subtle sheen or a more intense pop of color, it's easily achievable with just a few swipes. The formula contains spherical powders that allow it to glide on evenly, providing a superior, wet, glass-like shine that lasts.  The long-wearing benefits are a major plus. Once applied, it stays in place without moving or bleeding, giving me confidence in its longevity throughout the day. The cushiony texture is a dream u2013 it melts into my lips for comfortable, non-sticky wear.  I appreciate that this product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free. It aligns with my values, and the fact that it can be layered seamlessly over lipstick or lip liner for added shine and dimension makes it a versatile addition to my makeup routine.  In conclusion, the Bubble Pop Electric Lip Gloss in All My Love is a winner. It combines beautiful color, a mirror-like finish, and long-lasting wear in a formula that feels comfortable on the lips. If you're a lip gloss enthusiast, this is definitely one to try for a touch of warmth and dimension to your pout.

reviews.review_text: I tried GXVE Bubble Pop Electric High-Shine Lip Gloss in shades u201cSweet Toothu201d and u201cAll Of My Loveu201d. This lipgloss is thick, feels heavy, definitely has staying power, and has a sweet coconut scent. However, I found that the product didnu2019t want to stay on the center of my lips and would gravitate towards the outer corners of my lips. Iu2019m not sure why it kept doing this but it just didnu2019t work for me. I ended up gifting these to my best friend and she loves them! These lipglosses are worth a shot but I wonu2019t be trying any other shades just based on my experience with them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed cosmetologist with over 25 years of experience specializing in skincare and makeup artistry, I have a deep appreciation for Gwen Stefani's makeup line. However, my recent experience with the Bubble Pop electric high-performance lip gloss in the Sweet Tooth shade was not as favorable. While the color may appeal to many for a nude look, I found it less flattering on my lips. Achieving definition required a chocolate brown or deeper pencil, and the gloss felt somewhat gummy and appeared patchy. Perhaps age plays a role, as I'm over 50, but overall, it didn't provide the smooth appearance I expected, though this could be influenced by the chosen color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved skin care since I was young. It only made sense that I became an aesthetician. My passion for skin care overflowed into make up as well as supplemental. I currently work for a naturopath doctor and we help people heal from the inside out. I perform numerous treatments to help slow the aging process. I couldn't love what I do any more and only wish to help more people through my knowledge and training of skin and makeup practices as well as my education on nutritional supplements.  Love that these Lip Glosses are 100% vegan and cruelty free. They are made without parabens, phthalates, sulfates or synthetic fragrance but somehow still smell sweet like sugar! Not sure how Gwen does it but they smell like dessert and donu2019t contain any scary ingredients. These glosses are the kind that donu2019t need reapplying. I don't prefer the stickiness of them but with that said, they are thick and actually have great pigments so they add color and not just shine.

reviews.review_title: GXVE Gives My Lips All The Hydration And Shine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello I am Michele and Iu2019m a Beauty Expert in my 30u2019s. I have been a Gwen Stefani fan since I was in Junior High! She is the perfect mix of rebel punk rockstar meets glamorous beauty like me. When I heard of GXVE Beauty, I jumped at the chance to try it for myself and wear makeup made and inspired by one of my favorite female pop meets punk rock singers. The GXVE Beauty Bubble Pop Electric High-Performance Lip-Gloss has such a luxurious, smooth formulation. It has a beautiful, light, creamy lip gloss texture. I had the pleasure of trying two shades of this lip gloss, the All My Love and Sweet Tooth shades. The Sweet Tooth shade is a light, sheer, nude, pink shade on my lips. All My Love is my favorite shade of this lipgloss. Itu2019s a light, rosy pink color on my lips.  I love its gourmand flavor of vanilla. It smells and tastes like vanilla frosting. It takes me back to the lipglosses I used to love as a preteen and teen. Itu2019s doe foot applicator helps spread the right amount of lipgloss evenly on my lips. My lips feel so hydrated, glamorous and ready to rock. It is very easy and fun to layer both shades to create a bolder look. The lipgloss tube is clear with black letters on it with a black lid that holds the doe foot applicator.  Its box is a light brown color and has a fun red and white design on the inside. I would highly recommend this to any rebellious rockstar in their teens and older looking for a lipgloss that takes you back to the eary 2000u2019s and gives your lips a beautiful shine and wonderful hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is one of my favorite products in the whole GXVE line. The smooth formula goes on so beautifully and gives my lips a beautiful color and an amazing shiny finish. The applicator makes it easy to put an even layer onto my lips. I like the nice, sweet scent, like cotton candy. This lip gloss is long-lasting and does not feel sticky on my lips. I like that I can wear this lip gloss by itself or on top of a lipstick. A beautiful lip gloss that I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bubble pop electric high performance lip gloss by GXVE in the color All My Love is a delightful addition to any makeup collection. As a clean beauty brand, GXVE offers cruelty-free and vegan formulas, making these lip glosses a guilt-free indulgence. The lip glosses not only provide a stunning shine but also come with a delicious vanilla cupcake scent that adds a touch of sweetness to your makeup routine.  The high-performance formula of these lip glosses ensures long-lasting wear without any sticky or tacky feeling. They glide on smoothly, instantly enhancing the natural beauty of your lips. All My Love provides a deeper, romantic red shade for a more dramatic look.  What sets these lip glosses apart is their ability to moisturize and nourish the lips. Infused with hydrating ingredients, they keep your lips feeling soft and supple throughout the day. Whether you're going for a natural everyday look or a bold evening glam, the bubble pop electric high performance lip glosses by GXVE are a must-have for any lip gloss lover.

reviews.review_title: My lips appeared fuller and plump!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve worn a lot of lip-glosses, but nothing quite like this! Iu2019m continually impressed by the GXVE lineup in terms of both product variety and quality. Straight out of the tube the gloss smells amazing (no lie, everything so far has smelled delicious). You can definitely see the high shine before application right on the wand. Itu2019s not chunky sparkle pigments, but an overall lustre. No chunks = super smooth with no loss of shine. I have the shade u2018Dolled Upu2019 which is a true baby doll pink. I was second guessing how it might look on me because Iu2019m uber-pale, but itu2019s so true to color it captures a perfect bubblegum pink and looks very illustrative. One swipe leaves a luxe rich color, but it is buildable. For lighter shades like u2018Dolled Upu2019, I usually do two for fullest coverage (like Iu2019m gonna get stares). On the lips itu2019s very interesting; maybe the closest comparison is a lip lacquer crossed with a balm. The texture is wet but not sticky, and it feels solidly in place. This gloss is definitely high-performance and lasts all day, even through meals (there is some transfer, it stayed on one of my cups through a heavy wash cycle!). Which is wild for a lip-gloss, I feel like my lips are staying hydrated and gorgeous but not weighed down by the heaviness of a lipstick. I love that the color doesnu2019t bleed or fade, itu2019s very soft and creamy and does a great job coating the lips fully. My absolute favorite aspect is that shine tho! I added some unedited pics of my lips, yu2019all, they are not that luscious! That is all heavy-lifting by the gloss, I feel like I have the K-Beauty glassy douyin lips of my dreams. Shine and saturation for days, and it sits in every little corner and groove to give that illusion of thiccer and juicier mirror lips. Iu2019m very happy with u2018Dolled Upu2019, excited to try the other shades! My sincere gratitude to GXVE for gifting me this stunning lip-gloss.

reviews.review_text: - Creamy and slightly thick texture, but not u2018stickyu2019. But, the thickness makes me not like building up the layers. One layer is fine and moisture feeling. - More opaque than most my glosses, I love that. - Pretty colors but wish there were more, especially some u2018mediumu2019 berry or mauve tones - Smell is not bad, kind of a medium scent, but I donu2019t prefer it. Itu2019s not a deal breaker tho. To me, itu2019s not coconut, itu2019s more like a nutty baked good. So not bad, just prefer no fragrance or fruity instead. - Packaging is of course cool Gwen style and I like it overall. The applicator comes out with a good amount, as the tube thing cleans it off nicely when pulling it out. However, donu2019t really love the small doe foot. Actually prefer old school tubes tbh, but regardless the doe foot seems a bit flimsy, but not really terrible. - Good price point for the formula and packaging. Although, Iu2019m not too sure there is a ton of product after getting through the exterior packaging. - Wears well. Of course gloss comes off on straws or cups, etc but the leftovers still feel nice and thin layers stick around until wiped off. Doesnu2019t bleed on me.  Bought the color Candy and itu2019s so pretty, but I will be exchanging the color because this doesnu2019t show up enough on me to make enough of a difference to want to wear it or pay for it. Itu2019s just because itu2019s too similar to my natural color it seems. Patiently waiting for more colors :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to pick up the new lip gloss from GXVE after having the opportunity to try other lipsticks from the brand and after using All My Love every day for the last week, am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.  WHAT I LIKED: * Lightweight, thinner formula * High shine * Goes on smoothly * Light scent - itu2019s on the sweet side but not overwhelming (I didnu2019t pick up the vanilla scent others have mentioned but the scent does lean on the sweet side) * Pigmentation on most of the shades is really good for this type of gloss; the shade Candy was the least pigmented of all the ones in this first release of shades * All My Love is a pretty MLBB color, and I like that it leans on the cool-neutral side  AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT: * Longevity - I donu2019t expect glosses to wear all day but a little more lasting power wouldnu2019t hurt. I can get about 2-3 hours if Iu2019m not eating or drinking; otherwise, itu2019s an hour, maybe 2.  FYI / OTHER THOUGHTS: * Would love to see more colors in the future. The neutral, neutral-cool undertones of the current collection works for me but it would be nice to see some shades with warm undertones as well.

reviews.review_text: Normally lip glosses in this kind of baby pink donu2019t show up on my naturally red lips, but this one does, and with only one layer! The formula is high-shine and decently pigmented for a gloss . Formula applies tacky, but feels more like a lip balm after about five minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss feels sticky when you first apply to the lips but after some time once it warms up itu2019s fine. Color is very light for me so I probably be using it over the darker lipstick. It stay put on for quite a long time for a gloss and overall looks beautiful and shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this lipgloss Iu2019ve been dying to try out a lighter one and I feel this is the perfect basic to have itu2019s not overwhelming and looks very nice on the skin I will be using this for a neutral looks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness, the color and the texture is amazing! The texture is slightly sticky but perfect for staying on the lips! I love the color too! The packaging looks quite lux and I love the formula. Definitely a must have!
